rooms.title: Night Garden
rooms.description: Bioluminescent vines twine overhead. Footsteps hush on moss.

items.name: Luminous Petal
items.description: It sheds soft light, brightening when held near hidden paths.

items.name: Vial of Dew
items.description: The droplets chime like tiny bells whenever danger nears.

rooms.title: Singing Glasshouse
rooms.description: Condensation beads chime against crystal panes, watering rows of obedient aurora-flowers.

rooms.title: Rain Maker's Platform
rooms.description: A lattice of drums summons gentle rainclouds that politely take turns watering the beds below.

rooms.title: Moonpool Court
rooms.description: Silver water mirrors twin moons that wink whenever a wish sounds sincere enough.

rooms.title: Mistway
rooms.description: Cool fog drifts from stone arch to stone arch, carving ephemeral doorways toward the coast.

rooms.title: Serpent Bridge
rooms.description: A sinuous bridge of woven reeds sways above glowing wetlands alive with distant song.

rooms.title: Tidal Library
rooms.description: Shelves float on chained buoys, rising and falling with the surf while waterproof books gossip.

rooms.title: Root Caves
rooms.description: Massive roots braid into tunnels lit by fireflies who take attendance of every visitor.

rooms.title: Catacomb Nursery
rooms.description: Clay cradles line alcoves, each nurturing a sapling soul to be replanted in the daylight above.
